| footnotes = | pop_est_as_of = | pop_est_footnotes = | population_est = | name = }} Johns Creek is a city in the American state of Georgia. It was made a city on December 1, 2006. It is a suburb in the northeast of Atlanta. Johns Creek has about 82,000 people living in it. It is a part of Fulton County. Johns Creek is the 10th largest city in Georgia. ==References== == Other websites == *Official site Category:Cities in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Fulton County, Georgia
